name: Wizard-Scout
description:
A boy scout trains to be a wizard while he is camping. Use the keyboard and match musical patterns to cast spells, gather resources, set up camp, and cook!

Controls:

Walk: WSAD

Shift: Run

Pick Up: E

Cast: F

Match Patterns: ASD JKL

Credits:

Sound Designer:  Brady Muth - https://bradymuthmusic.com/

Graphic designer: Josue Calle - https://www.instagram.com/brash_h/

Programmer: Harold Troya - https://twitter.com/HaroldTroya
